q1.question: How long does implementation take?
q1.answer: Most organizations are fully operational within 7-10 business days. We provide data migration assistance, user training, and dedicated onboarding support.

q2.question: Is TCMS EASA compliant?
q2.answer: Yes, TCMS is built to comply with EASA ADR.OR.D.017 and FAA Part 121/135 requirements. All audit trails, digital signatures, and records meet regulatory standards.

q3.question: Can we migrate existing data from spreadsheets?
q3.answer: Absolutely. Our team assists with data migration from Excel, Google Sheets, or legacy systems. Historical training records are preserved with complete audit trails.

q4.question: How secure is our data?
q4.answer: TCMS uses enterprise-grade security with row-level isolation, encrypted storage, and GDPR compliance. Each organization's data is completely segregated.

q5.question: What happens if a crew member fails a proficiency check?
q5.answer: TCMS automatically triggers retake workflows, schedules remedial training, and enforces the maximum 3-attempt rule. Assessors receive automated notifications.

q6.question: Do you offer mobile access?
q6.answer: Yes, TCMS is fully responsive and works on tablets/smartphones. Instructors commonly use iPads for digital signatures during training sessions.

q7.question: Can we customize grading schemas?
q7.answer: Yes, TCMS supports standard 1-5 grading, AQP, EBT, and custom schemas. We can configure assessment criteria to match your training standards.

q8.question: What support is included?
q8.answer: All plans include email support. Enterprise and Fleet plans include priority support and dedicated account management.
